title: Dragons of a Lost Star
description: As the War of Souls continues, the shield over the elven kingdom of Silvanesti falls. Mina leads her forces triumphantly into that conquered nation, only to face danger from friends and foes alike. Meanwhile, Goldmoon follows the river of the dead, which threatens to engulf them all.Dragons of a Lost Star expands on the War of Souls saga and forms the point around which subsequent novels will revolve.
author: Margaret Weis
